Fault.name: BPEL/CriarTransferenciaMercadoriaCDBPELProcess.bpel
Fault.fix: You should place all explicit <bpel:import> statements in a BPEL 2.0 process.
Fault.msg: There are no explicit "import" statements in <bpel:process> "CriarTransferenciaMercadoriaCDBPELProcess" as required by BPEL 2.0 standard.

Fault.name: BPEL/CriarTransferenciaMercadoriaCDBPELProcess.bpel
Fault.fix: Make sure that value "ns2:Root-Element" is resolvable (check imports, value of "element").
Fault.msg: "element" is set to "ns2:Root-Element" on this <bpel:variable> but it cannot be resolved (check value of "element", imports, WSDLs or XSDs).

Fault.name: BPEL/CriarTransferenciaMercadoriaCDBPELProcess.bpel
Fault.fix: Check the bpel:variable specified on this node via attribute "variable" and make sure it is itself specified correctly.
Fault.msg: The node <bpel:to> refers to a bpel:variable (via the attribute "variable") - this bpel:variable needs to be defined correctly.
